data.title: WORLDWAR: UPSETTING THE BALANCE
data.meta_description: New York: A Del Rey Book / Ballantine Books, 1996 . Octavo, cloth backed boards. First edition. The third book of the first four volume series of an alternate history in which an alien invasion takes place during World War II. Reference: Anatomy of Wonder 2004 II-1151 . A fine copy in a fine dust jacket. 27097 . Item #27097
data.text:
Turtledove, Harry.

New York: A Del Rey Book / Ballantine Books, [1996]. Octavo, cloth backed boards. First edition. The third book of the first four volume series of an alternate history in which an alien invasion takes place during World War II. [Reference: Anatomy of Wonder (2004) II-1151]. A fine copy in a fine dust jacket. (27097). Item #27097
